io.github.jonestimd.swing.action

Class BackgroundAction<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.swing.AbstractAction
      • io.github.jonestimd.swing.action.MnemonicAction
        • io.github.jonestimd.swing.action.BackgroundAction<T>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, java.util.EventListener, javax.swing.Action
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ReloadTableAction

    public abstract class BackgroundAction<T>
extends MnemonicAction
    An abstract action for performing a task on a background thread.
